summary: An honest and decorated police officer is arrested on charges of mass murder and trapped in a corrupt political system, where he finds himself sinking in deep trouble.
cast: Salman Khan|Shilpa Shetty Kundra|Arbaaz Khan|Farida Jalal|Amrish Puri|Mohan Joshi|Govind Namdeo|Mukesh Rishi|Shivaaji Satam|Vijayendra Ghatge|Reshma Bombaywala|Rajpal Yadav|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Anupam Kher|Anant Jog|Hemant Birje|Stephen Fernandes|Inder Sudan|Rana Jung Bahadur|Deepak Bhatia|Deepak Jaity|Ravi Jhankal|Aly Khan|Daman Maan|Akanksha Malhotra|Sudhir Mittu|Prasoon Narayan|Jaspal Sandhu|Pradeep Saxena|Rajeev Saxena|Sanjeev Siddarth|Brijesh Tripathi|Nimai Bali|Surendra Rahi|Santosh Shetty|Yusuf
title: Garv: Pride and Honour
